html:
A record-breaking discount on the 2025 MacBook Air M4 has been issued, driving the standard model down to an all-time best $849.

Amazon and Best Buy are engaged in a MacBook Air price war, with customers benefitting from a 15% price cut on the latest M4 13-inch model with 16GB of unified memory and 256GB of storage.

  • 13" MacBook Air M4: On sale from $849 ($150 off) at Amazon
  • 13" MacBook Air M4: On sale from $849 ($150 off) at Best Buy
  • 15" MacBook Air M4: On sale from $1,049 ($150 off) at Amazon
  • 15" MacBook Air M4: On sale from $1,049 ($150 off) at Best Buy

Now priced at $849 in all four colorways, this MacBook Air deal delivers the lowest price on record for the popular configuration that now comes with 16GB of memory standard.

And at the budget-friendly price, the laptop makes a great graduation gift or Mother's Day present.

If you prefer more storage or the larger 15-inch screen size, it's worth checking out our 13-inch MacBook Air M4 Price Guide and 15-inch MacBook Air M4 Price Guide, as there are exclusive discounts in effect on upgraded models as well.
